mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT( menu.permission_, '.', um.permission_ ) permission FROM sys_menu menu JOIN sys_user_menu um ON um.menu_id = menu.id_ WHERE length(menu.permission_) > 0 AND um.user_id = #{userId} UNION SELECT CONCAT( menu.permission_, '.', rm.permission_ ) permission FROM sys_menu menu JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON rm.menu_id = menu.id_ JOIN sys_user_role ur ON ur.role_id = rm.role_id WHERE length(menu.permission_) > 0 AND ur.user_id = #{userId}
